You could probably confront him about it and use it to embarrass him.<</if>> <<if $felixpanties == 1>><span style="color:#FFBF4F;">''Felix's Panties''</span> - You found some panties in Felix's room for some reason, which probably aren't really his. You could probably confront him about it and embarass him.<</if>>''Colored Names'': Names of characters that are colored indicates that the character has a main storyline/relationship for you to play through. There are other characters that may ask tasks of you, but they are generally short and don't lead to much, as opposed to the main characers which feature longer, branching stories. ''Icons''<img src="images/general/cash.png"><img src="images/general/arousal.png"><img src="images/general/energy.png"><img src="images/general/looks.png">: These icons are meant to easily notify you of the main stat that an action will affect. Note that it doesn't tell you ALL stats affected or to what degree, so make sure you pay attention! <span style="color:#FFBF4F;">''Energy''</span>: Pretty self explanatory, but you need energy to perform most actions. Don't forget to sleep, as this is your main way of recovering energy and moving forward in the week! <span style="color:#D87CCA;">''Arousal''</span>: A simple indicator of how aroused your character is; it ranges from 0 to 100. Be sure to keep track of it, as having too high or too low arousal will affect certain events. <span style="color:#E94F2E;">''Attractiveness''</span>: Also ranging from 0 to 100, this is a measure of how appealing you are to other characters in general. This can affect some events, as well as even changing how some people act around you. ''Hidden Stats'': There are a few stats that are hidden, those being how perverted you are becoming and how feminine you are becoming. These stats can only be viewed to some extent in the Status page, only giving you descriptions of your levels for you to decipher, rather than clear numbers. These stats are important for certain events in the game and you will have to do your best to keep track of them (as increases and descreases will generally not be spelled out for you either).<center>[img[images/locations/pawnshop_Owner.jpg]]</center> "''Yeah, what can I get for you?''" the shop owner groans, looking rather apathetic. <div class="card"> <img
